com.sucy.skill.tree.basic

Class InventoryTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sucy.skill.tree.SkillTree
      • com.sucy.skill.tree.basic.InventoryTree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicHorizontalTree, BasicVerticalTree, FloodTree, LevelTree, RequirementTree

    public abstract class InventoryTree
extends SkillTree
    A skill tree manager for classes
